entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers and drizzle ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
